name: mercari

display.label: Admin Changed
display.description: The admin of the contract has been changed.

display.label: Beacon Upgraded
display.description: The beacon contract has been upgraded.

display.label: Initialized
display.description: The contract has been initialized.

display.label: Log New Offer
display.description: A new offer has been created.

operation.signature: event LogNewOffer(bytes32 indexed _offerId, address indexed _token, uint256 _chainId)

display.label: Log New Trade
display.description: A new trade has been made.

operation.signature: event LogNewTrade(address indexed _seller, bytes32 indexed _tradeId, address indexed _token, uint256 _amount, bytes32 _offerId)

display.label: Log Set Chain Id Offer
display.description: The chain ID of an offer has been updated.

triggers.name: Log Set Max Price Limit Offer

display.label: Log Set Max Price Limit Offer
display.description: The upper price limit of an offer has been updated.

triggers.name: Log Set Min Price Limit Offer

display.label: Log Set Min Price Limit Offer
display.description: The lower price limit of an offer has been updated.

display.label: Log Set Status Offer
display.description: The status of an offer has been updated.

display.label: Log Set Token Offer
display.description: The token of an offer has been updated.

display.label: Ownership Transferred
display.description: The ownership of the contract has been transferred.

operation.signature: event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)

display.label: Upgraded
display.description: The contract has been upgraded.

display.label: Check Max Price Limit Offer
display.description: Checks if the price of an offer is below a maximum price limit.

operation.signature: function checkMaxPriceLimitOffer(bytes32 offerId, bytes maxPriceLimit) returns (bool)

inputFields.label: Max Price Limit
inputFields.helpText: The maximum price limit in bytes format.

display.label: Check Min Price Limit Offer
display.description: Checks if the price of an offer is above a minimum price limit.

operation.signature: function checkMinPriceLimitOffer(bytes32 offerId, bytes minPriceLimit) returns (bool)

inputFields.label: Min Price Limit
inputFields.helpText: The minimum price limit in bytes format.

actions.name: Deposit MRI Token And Accept Offer

display.label: Deposit MRI Token And Accept Offer
display.description: Deposits a specified amount of MRI token and accepts an offer.

operation.signature: function depositMRITokenAndAcceptOffer(address token, uint256 amount, bytes32 offerId, address destAddress, uint256 amountOffer) returns (bytes32)

inputFields.label: Amount
inputFields.helpText: The amount of tokens to deposit.

inputFields.label: Dest Address
inputFields.helpText: The destination address for the tokens.

display.label: Deposit Native And Accept Offer
display.description: Deposits a specified amount of native currency and accepts an offer.

operation.signature: function depositNativeAndAcceptOffer(bytes32 offerId, address destAddress, uint256 amountOffer) returns (bytes32)

inputFields.label: Dest Address
inputFields.helpText: The destination address for the native currency.

display.label: Get Amount Offer For Trade
display.description: Gets the amount of tokens offered for a trade.

display.label: Get Buyer Trade
display.description: Gets the buyer's address for a trade.

display.label: Get Chain Id Offer
display.description: Gets the chain ID of an offer.

display.label: Get Deposit Amount Trade
display.description: Gets the deposit amount for a trade.

display.label: Get Deposit Chain Id Trade
display.description: Gets the deposit chain ID for a trade.

display.label: Get Deposit Token Trade
display.description: Gets the deposit token address for a trade.

display.label: Get Destination Address Trade
display.description: Gets the destination address for a trade.

display.label: Get MRI Token
display.description: Gets the address of the MRI token.

actions.name: Get Max Price Limit Hash Offer

display.label: Get Max Price Limit Hash Offer
display.description: Gets the hash of the maximum price limit for an offer.

actions.name: Get Min Price Limit Hash Offer

display.label: Get Min Price Limit Hash Offer
display.description: Gets the hash of the minimum price limit for an offer.

display.label: Get Nonce Offer
display.description: Gets the nonce of an offer for a user.

display.label: Get Nonce User Trade
display.description: Gets the nonce of a user for a trade.

display.label: Get Offer Id For Trade
display.description: Gets the ID of the offer associated with a trade.

display.label: Get Payment Info Trade
display.description: Gets the payment information for a trade.

operation.signature: function getPaymentInfoTrade(bytes32 tradeId) returns (bytes32, address, address, uint256)

display.label: Get Seller Offer
display.description: Gets the seller's address for an offer.

display.label: Get Status Offer
display.description: Gets the status of an offer.

display.label: Get Token Offer
display.description: Get the token offer address for a given offer ID.

display.label: Initialize
display.description: Initialize the contract with the address of the tokenMRI contract.

inputFields.label: Token MRI
inputFields.helpText: The address of the tokenMRI contract.

display.label: Is Complete Trade
display.description: Check if a trade with the given trade ID is complete.

display.label: Owner
display.description: Get the owner address of the contract.

display.label: Proxiable UUID
display.description: Get the UUID of the proxiable contract.

display.label: Renounce Ownership
display.description: Renounce ownership of the contract.

display.label: Set Chain Id Offer
display.description: Set the chain ID for a specific offer.

display.label: Set Complete Trade
display.description: Set the complete status of a trade.

display.label: Set Is Active Offer
display.description: Set the active status of an offer.

display.label: Set MRI Token
display.description: Set the tokenMRI contract address.

inputFields.label: Token MRI
inputFields.helpText: The address of the tokenMRI contract.

display.label: Set Max Price Limit Offer
display.description: Set the maximum price limit for a specific offer.

inputFields.label: Max Price Limit
inputFields.helpText: The maximum price limit to set.

display.label: Set Min Price Limit Offer
display.description: Set the minimum price limit for a specific offer.

inputFields.label: Min Price Limit
inputFields.helpText: The minimum price limit to set.

display.label: Set Offer
display.description: Create a new offer with the specified parameters.

operation.signature: function setOffer(address token, uint256 chainId, bytes minPriceLimit, bytes maxPriceLimit) returns (bytes32)

display.label: Set Token Offer
display.description: Set the token address for a specific offer.

display.label: Transfer Ownership
display.description: Transfer ownership of the contract to a new owner.

inputFields.label: New Owner
inputFields.helpText: The address of the new owner.

display.label: Upgrade To
display.description: Upgrade the contract to a new implementation.

inputFields.label: New Implementation
inputFields.helpText: The address of the new implementation.

display.label: Upgrade To And Call
display.description: Upgrade the contract to a new implementation and call a function on the new implementation.

inputFields.label: New Implementation
inputFields.helpText: The address of the new implementation.

inputFields.label: Data
inputFields.helpText: The data to call on the new implementation.

display.label: Withdraw ERC 20 Tokens
display.description: Withdraw ERC20 tokens from the contract.

operation.signature: function withdrawERC20Tokens(address token, uint256 amount, address to)

inputFields.label: Token
inputFields.helpText: The address of the token to withdraw.

inputFields.label: To
inputFields.helpText: The address to send the tokens to.

display.label: Withdraw Native
display.description: Withdraw native tokens from the contract.

inputFields.label: To
inputFields.helpText: The address to send the tokens to.

description: A web3 connector for interacting with a smart contract that manages offers and trades. It allows users to create and accept offers, deposit tokens or native currency, and perform various actions related to offers and trades.
